name: Lascivious
description:
Dupic has been trapped in valentine's land by his brother Cupid
the place is filled with loving creatures. it's disgusting!  sharing their love with the world? yuck.. oh no!
their love is getting stronger when they are together!
shoot them before they become too strong! you need to find a way to escape! 

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 
based on the theme : 'Stronger together'. 
it was made in one week from scratch.
hope you like it! 

credits: 

Progrmmer - Avace 

2D artist - DeathBiscuitt

Sound artist - F3SH
